name: The Resting Place
description:
Created for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam from 02.08.2019 - 04.08.2019.
Theme: Only One.

The Resting Place is an experimental game about transitioning from one life to another. Your time has come to leave your mark. You can leave only one.

Controls:

Movement: W A S D or ARROWS

Zoom: Q and E

Additional controls are taught in game.

Credits:

Created by Pet Pumpkin with help from Avocado Dog <3

Thanks for taking the time to play the game, I'm interested to see what becomes of it!

Made With:

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Google
  • Aseprite
  • Garageband
  • AutoDesk Sketchbook
  • Love
